text:
Placemeter, New York & Paris, ONSITE, http://www.placemeter.com

Founded in 2012, Placemeter is an urban intelligence platform. We quantify the movement of modern cities, at scale, by using proprietary computer vision technology on live streams and archival video. We take privacy very seriously, designing our systems to yield useful data without identity detection.

We are a small team working on some seriously hard problems. We value everything that lets us move fast while keeping our code and design standards high - continuous integration, frequent deployment, great communication tools such as Slack.

Open positions:

Lead Engineer, Backend Operations, New York: http://grnh.se/gkawp2

Senior Frontend Engineer, Paris (Angular/Bootstrap/Node): http://grnh.se/3lkqcu

Senior Backend Engineer, Paris (Python/Django/MySQL/Cassandra): http://grnh.se/jt6ey0
